title: Manage Construction Draw Requests
description: During construction, the developer must submit draw requests to the lender to get funds to pay contractors.

tasks.description: Collect invoices and lien waivers from all contractors for work completed during the period.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary backup documentation for the draw request is gathered.

tasks.description: Prepare the draw request package in the format required by the lender, including a summary of work completed.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete and accurate draw request is assembled.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the lender's inspector to visit the site and verify the completed work.
tasks.expected_outcome: The site inspection is completed successfully, allowing the lender to release the funds.
